programme.desc: Water Buggin - When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Circus - Ryder gets a call from the Circus ringmaster Ellie the baby elephant has escaped from the circus train!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Charger A Super Bed / The Crew Builds A Super Squirrely Whirly Playground - Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Little Doras Big Adventure / Bye Bye Balloon - Big Red Chicken accidentally shrinks Dora and Boots so it's up to Dora's little brother and sister to help get them big again.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Summer Camp I / Summer Camp II - Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. // The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on "Thse", a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts / Rainbow Salad - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Legend of the Night Howler / The Haystack Stakeout - Sam and Kit track a legendary creature who's spreading an unstoppable itch among prairie dogs. // Who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Crew Raises A Runway/ The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard - When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build // Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash - Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Catch The Quickatoo / Lost Lorito - Abuela shows Dora her photo album of birds, with one page blank: the Quickatoo. Dora vows to find the Quickatoo and get a picture to complete the album.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Days of Summer - Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence Please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Epic Sail - Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Gift Hunt / Paddington's Burns Night Haggis Hunt - Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Ratoncito Perez / The Berry Hungry Caterpillar - Dora helps Ratoncito Perez fix his magic toothbrush wand so she can get a gift for her missing tooth. // Dora meets Carlos, a giant caterpillar who wants to be a butterfly!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Legend of the Night Howler / The Haystack Stakeout - Sam and Kit track a legendary creature who's spreading an unstoppable itch among prairie dogs. // Who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile?

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Return of the Nightwalker - Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Dennis Drones On - Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sharkdog Sitting - While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Pup a Doodle Do - Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party - Caf Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep128
programme.desc: My Cousin Chlo - Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: The Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts / Rainbow Salad - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Ruby Tart - On Ruby Day, Chef always celebrates the same traditions, including making a Ruby Tart. But this year, everything goes wrong.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep97
programme.desc: Treasure Trail - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, LaaLaa and Po follow a trail of flowers which leads them to some very special treasure.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Goat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'goat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! Dee meets lots of different goats - a white goat, a brown goat, a bearded goat and a baby goat!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jurassic Pop - A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Funny Bones - Lofty has a broken finger, so Mustard goes in search of help. Messy and friends save the day and discover that bones are amazing.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Dusky Leaf Monkey - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Malaysia, South East Asia on a baby animal mission to find out why new born dusky leaf monkeys look so different to their parents.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Mission: Seaside - Kika and Dr Amit learn a new route on their way to the seaside. But when Anoushka forgets her jacket, they have to retrace their steps in a hurry before they miss the bus home.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Dhole and Dwarf Mongoose - In this episode we meet the dhole and dwarf mongoose - their wild connection is that they both use sentries.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Back - In this episode Captain Captain returns to her beloved Scarlet Squid (much to the surprise of Gem) and has brought along two brand new pirates, Sandy and Seaweed, to help win those jewels back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep31
programme.desc: The Getting Ready Badge - The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Seattle Space Needle, USA - The team goes where no Go Jetter has gone before, when Glitch tries to launch into space.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Venice, Italy - The Go Jetters get a sinking feeling when Glitch turns the canals of Venice into roads.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep6
programme.desc: Shankar's Makeover - There's a fancy dress competition on the railways and while Thomas and the others are excited, Shankar doesn't want to join in.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Tortoise Snooze - When it is time for Tortoise to hibernate, Sarah and Duck help him find a quiet place.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Garden Gaming - Duck is getting frustrated with his new computer game, so Sarah builds a new version.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Den - Little Woo and Seamus call Stanley to help them build a den so they can watch the bugs in the forest without disturbing them. Stanley builds a giant, camouflaged den on legs.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Shipwreck - Benjamin and Hettie find an old treasure map that leads to Blue Whiskers' Pirate Shipwreck! They ask Stanley to help them find it and maybe bring it back to show the townsfolk.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - During a game of hide and seek, Monty wonders whether there is a way to hide other than in or behind something.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep37
programme.desc: It's Time for a Tea Party - JoJo & Gran Gran discover Ezra's having a Tyrannosaurus Tea Party at the Museum! But, when Ezra doesn't have time to make his special strawberry cake, Gran Gran has a plan to help!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Perfect - For her Father's Day card, Bluey sets out to draw a picture of herself and her father together. While recalling her favourite memories of playing with Bandit, Bluey struggles with the idea that her drawing must be perfect. Chilli tries to convince Bluey that perfection isn't easy, or absolutely necessary.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Explorers - While waiting to be picked up from school, Jack plays at being a sailor trying to find his way back home to Australia. Meanwhile, Jack's Dad has got lost on route to collect him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep34
programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep33
programme.desc: The Wish Badge - Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep32
programme.desc: The Size Badge - The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep34
programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep33
programme.desc: The Wish Badge - Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep32
programme.desc: The Size Badge - The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Festive Special - Carrot, Potato, Parsnip and Brussels Sprout perform the festive classic Auld Lang Syne.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Kiwi - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Kiwi performing Do the Kiwi Dance - if he manages to find someone to interview him first.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Veg-O-Vision Song Contest - Supertato and the Tato Team must battle to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's earth-shaking stomping performance at the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Desserts of Destiny - Evil Pea lures Supertato and Tomato into her cave of frosted doom. Can they find the courage to avoid her traps and retrieve The Lost Candle of Birthdays for Tomato's Museum?

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep97
programme.desc: Treasure Trail - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, LaaLaa and Po follow a trail of flowers which leads them to some very special treasure.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Goat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'goat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! Dee meets lots of different goats - a white goat, a brown goat, a bearded goat and a baby goat!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jurassic Pop - A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Funny Bones - Lofty has a broken finger, so Mustard goes in search of help. Messy and friends save the day and discover that bones are amazing.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Pavlova - Mum won't let Bingo have Pavlova, so the kids find a way by playing a cheeky game of Caf in the kitchen. But Dad the chef sets up a competing shop that only serves edamame beans.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Dusky Leaf Monkey - Andy, Jen and Scout head to Malaysia, South East Asia on a baby animal mission to find out why new born dusky leaf monkeys look so different to their parents.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Mission: Seaside - Kika and Dr Amit learn a new route on their way to the seaside. But when Anoushka forgets her jacket, they have to retrace their steps in a hurry before they miss the bus home.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Dhole and Dwarf Mongoose - In this episode we meet the dhole and dwarf mongoose - their wild connection is that they both use sentries.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Back - In this episode Captain Captain returns to her beloved Scarlet Squid (much to the surprise of Gem) and has brought along two brand new pirates, Sandy and Seaweed, to help win those jewels back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep31
programme.desc: The Getting Ready Badge - The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep30
programme.desc: The Cinema Badge - Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep29
programme.desc: The Difficult Badge - As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.desc: Trade-offs of a Global City-state (English Subtitles) - Kelly Latimer explores how Singapore balances openness to wealth, talent and diversity, comparing Venice, Monaco and the Vatican, to reveal the delicate trade-offs of thriving as a global city-state.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the days events.

programme.title: Separation Declassified - 100 Days That Shocked the World Ep2
programme.desc: A gripping political docu-thriller set in the shadows of 1965, Singapore: Declassified uncovers the countdown to Singapores separation from Malaysia, told through secret files, midnight deals, and intensifying global stakes

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.desc: The Trabant: Automotive Lemon or Cult Car? - First built as East Germanys answer to the "Peoples Car, the Trabant gave the countrys people freedom of mobility and a sense of hope. A feeling that soured as other countries made rapid progress while East Germany and the Trabi stayed the same. We trace the Trabants journey from necessity, to automotive lemon, to when it made its way through to the West after the fall of the Berlin Wall.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: How to tackle school bullying - On this weeks show, we explore how to effectively address bullying in schools. Many children endure bullying, suffering severe injuries and long-term mental health struggles. We turn to Kenya, where bullying is officially banned, yet persists in new forms. programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef
programme.desc: Chef Saito was born and raised in Osaka. He guides us around its restaurants, cookware stores, and kombu kelp specialty stores, in an introduction to the prefecture's traditional food culture.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Afuso Michie is a Japanese-Brazilian woman who runs a center in Kanagawa Prefecture that offers Japanese language classes and other services which help foreign residents find their footing.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Bananas in Japan visit a plantation in one of the country's snowiest regions, and learn how sweetness is carefully developed in large Tokyo warehouses during the import process.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Will Sparks Fly?
programme.desc: A dapper young man sits in a teahouse with his older companion when a young woman catches his eye. From the way they're looking at each other, it's clear that there's something going on between them.

programme.title: Borderless Care
programme.desc: A new care facility in Japan without any barriers between people with disabilities and the community is spotlighted. We take a close look at how one woman user changes by interacting with the locals.

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: Nozokizaka, a steep hill in Tokyo's Toshima Ward, takes people's breath away in more ways than one. For three days, we asked people why they go up and down this road that's also a test of stamina.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Science View
programme.desc: Microbial ecologist Yusuke OKAZAKI attempts to understand the function of C-shaped bacteria found deep in Lake Biwa, using DNA analysis to glimpse one of Earth's many hidden ecosystems.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Walker vs. Zhang
programme.desc: Prelims - When the UFC makes its second trip to Shanghai on August 23rd, one of Chinas top young stars will lead the way as The Mountain Tiger, Zhang Mingyang, faces off with Brazils Johnny Walker in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Currently sporting a 12-fight winning streak that includes first-round knockouts of Brendson Ribeiro, Ozzy Diaz and Anthony Smith, the 27-year-old Zhang is a finisher of the highest order, and he expects to add another victory to his ledger when he takes on Walker, a veteran light heavyweight contender who also has the ability to end a fight with a single strike

programme.title: UFC 319: Du Plessis vs. Chimaev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to United Center in the Windy City of Chicago on August 17 with a stacked UFC 319 event featuring one of the most highly anticipated middleweight title fights in years. South Africas Dricus Du Plessis has taken UFC by storm since arriving in the Octagon in 2020, and after winning the UFC middleweight crown against Sean Strickland, hes continued to dominate with wins over Israel Adesanya and Strickland in their February rematch. But many believe his toughest test to date will be unbeaten challenger Khamzat Chimaev, whose list of UFC victories includes the names of Robert Whittaker, Kamaru Usman and Gilbert Burns
